amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the removal provision in section 5 of this bill from applying if a party to a class action suit destroys material relating to the subject matter of the class action or makes a misrepresentation with respect to the existence of such materials.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit a party to a class action from removing the case to a district court if that party destroys material relating to the subject matter of the class action, or makes a misrepresentation with respect to existence of such materials.
